channel.title: CVE Feed for Mr Digital -- Simple Image Popup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mr Digital -- Simple Image Popup

item.title: CVE-2024-4433|2024-08-01T20:40:47.224Z -- mr%20digital -- simple%20image%20popup
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mr Digital Simple Image Popup allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Image Popup: from n/a through 2.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-4433|2024-06-04T17:53:16.206Z -- mr%20digital -- simple%20image%20popup
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mr Digital Simple Image Popup allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Image Popup: from n/a through 2.4.0.
